keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with the freedom to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day
issues.education: Broken promises on key issues, Health, Education, Immigration and the Economy!

leaflet.personalStatement: As a UKIP activist I have learnt just how disillusioned and angry Bexley residents are with the whole Con/Lab Administrations. Broken promises on key issues, Health, Education, Immigration and the Economy! During my 30 years in public services I witnessed the vast sums of public money misspent and wasted. As a specialist in the areas of Criminal Justice, Immigration and the Care Systems, I have seen these and other essential core services asset stripped. I pledge to fight for a fairer Great Britain.

politicalExperience.achievements: Specialist in the areas of Criminal Justice, Immigration and the Care Systems.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Catherine Reilly on behalf of Catherine Reilly, 35 Walden Close, Upper Belvedere, KENT.

images.caption: Catherine Reilly pictured next to UKIP and British flag graphics.
